title: Episode 33: Daniel Bowman Simon & Evan Schoepke
description: This week on Let’s Eat In Cathy spoke to Daniel Bowman Simon of People’s Garden NYC and Evan Schoepke of Punk Rock Permaculture. They discussed the art and science of permaculture and what permaculture means to society.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
content:encoded: This week on Let’s Eat In Cathy spoke to Daniel Bowman Simon of People’s Garden NYC and Evan Schoepke of Punk Rock Permaculture. They discussed the art and science of permaculture and what permaculture means to society.
